changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: update client_details cd set client_name=p.credit_name, client_description=p.biography from profile p where p.orcid=cd.client_details_id and p.orcid_type = 'CLIENT'

changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: update client_details cd set client_website=ru.url from researcher_url ru where ru.orcid=cd.client_details_id

changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: update client_details set client_name='UNDEFINED', client_description='UNDEFINED' where client_name is NULL

changeSet.author: Angel Montenegro
changeSet.sql: update client_details set client_website='UNDEFINED' where client_website is NULL
